name: MariaDB DevContainer
postStartCommand: sudo chown -R vscode:vscode /workspace && sudo mkdir -p /run/mysqld && sudo chown mysql:mysql /run/mysqld && sudo mysqld_safe --skip-networking=0 --socket=/run/mysqld/mysqld.sock & sleep 5 && sudo mariadb -e 'CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS mydatabase; CREATE USER IF NOT EXISTS \'vscode\'@\'%\' IDENTIFIED BY \'\'; GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON mydatabase.* TO \'vscode\'@\'%\'; FLUSH PRIVILEGES;' && python3 .devcontainer/create_db.py && (cd /workspace && git rev-parse --is-inside-work-tree 2>/dev/null || git init) && (cd /workspace && git branch -M main)
